Professionally Managed by Kozystay

Elevate your stay in this modern studio set in the vibrant heart of Bandung. Surrounded by top dining spots, shopping destinations, and city highlights, the space offers a refined atmosphere with all the comforts you need for a seamless urban experience.

+ Digital Check-in

BEST FOR: Family, Staycation

NON-SMOKING

General

Bedroom

+ 43'' Smart TV
+ Access to Netflix 
+ Hair dryer

Kitchen

+ Microwave

+ Fitness center

We are available for small chat and recommendations.

+ 2.3 km from Bandung Train Station

*** IMPORTANT INFORMATION ***
+ Kozystay is NOT a hotel but individually managed apartments. We do not provide a front desk for check-in or reservations. The building management is separate from Kozystay management and therefore all communication during guest stay and check-in & check-out process must be via Kozystay personnel
+ Guests must ensure contact details listed on Airbnb is valid and reachable

SECURITY & COMMUNICATION
+ Each guests are strictly required to provide a form of identification (ID/passport) prior to check-in.
+ Communication throughout stay will be via web-based app or WA

BUILDING
+ Hourly parking is available in the building

SERVICE
+ We are always on hand to make your visit as enjoyable as possible and we pride ourselves on going the extra mile so please don't hesitate to contact us. Whether you need help with the apartment, a recommendation or somewhere to leave your suitcase, we are here to assist
+ Extra cleaning is available with extra charge (250k/cleaning), this includes change of linens, amenities, and 2-3 hour cleaning

LONG TERM STAYS
Stay longer and save up to 45% on your stay
+ Weekly : 5%
+ >1 month : Contact us directly
